name: places/ChIJVbQTRqZZwokRYbS_D83RDNM
formattedAddress: 4 E 28th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I am pregnant high up in the 7th floor there is no ventilation it’s literally 100 degrees up here in this small room I cannot even sleep at night have addressed the staff about the ac problem but they don’t seem to care since they have air conditioner downstairs only in the area where they work. They get paid 5,000 per room each night to treat us like animals, i called 311 theee times to report the problem I have to spend the whole day outside its hotter in here than it is outside.  I had to be hospitalized last night because I couldn’t breathe. Oh , and the security sleeps downstairs while on shift while we suffer from extreme heat conditions which can lead to fainting and heat exhaustion and I am currently pregnant.

originalText.text: Staffs are very rude and nonchalant about everything. No one in there care about your health nor the condition of the place. Theres no ventilation in the room, mold and stains in the bathroom and the toilet is filthy. That place is not suitable for living muchless to even have a child to live in there.
